data.name: Asteroid Force
data.detailed_description:
Asteroid Force is a fun and fast paced arcade style shooter. You are a pilot of a ship with one mission, protect Earth from incoming asteroids. Asteroids are not the only thing you need to worry about, certain levels also include aliens. Defeating asteroids and aliens earns you medallions that can be used to purchase upgrades. Good luck out there!

Protect the Earth:
- Shields available
- Health pickups

Upgrade your ship:
- Improved weapons
- Improve ship thrust
- Increase shield count

How many waves can you complete?

data.short_description: Asteroids are headed directly towards Earth. Destroy asteroids before they can slam into Earth. Earn medallions to purchase ship upgrades to help in the fight to save Earth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
